website_summaries.verdict: A good price on a decent oil mister in a glass bottle.
pros: Made from stainless steel and glass
Works well for spraying on salads
Solid thick pump button for spraying
Can also be used with vinegar or wine for salads
cons: The glass bottle can break when dropped

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer is easy to fill and hasn’t leaked on me yet. The actual spray is very even and will coat my veggies with just a few pumps. I even use it to spray olive oil on my salad instead of pouring it and having it all settle on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Pink_smoke25

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and mist comes out perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty glass bottle and the sprayer is excellent. I purchased this to spray my air fryer with organic olive oil. It sprayed a perfect mist on my french fries. Not too much and not too little.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It gives a very even spray. I spray everything I put in my air fryer. Keeps everything moist. If you like to cook this is a must have tool. good quality for the price. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Sprays perfectly and even looks nice on the counter top!
customer_reviews.author: skymomma

customer_reviews.title: Fairly useless
customer_reviews.text: This is difficult to fill, but the real issue is that it doesn't "mist" the oil. It just spits it out in gobs.
customer_reviews.author: Nikol Hasler

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: It's a joke. When i put my olive oil it sprayed but it is not misting at all. I will not buy this again instead i will go to dollar tree and buy spray bottle and put my oil on it since it works the same
customer_reviews.author: Ann coops

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality worked for a month then stop spraying. The spray won’t even come out kept squirting it nothing
customer_reviews.author: Mahi Arora

customer_reviews.title: Classy, well made
customer_reviews.text: A perfect spritzer. I fill it (easily) with garlic flavored olive oil and spritz everything. One minor point, it seemed to sometimes clog for no reason. I cut a quarter inch off the bottom of the tube and walla! No more "clogs". it was just long enough to sometimes grab onto the bottom of the bottle. Well made, feels and looks classy. Highly reccoed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolelle's Husband

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and seller. My bottle came broken despite the well packaging. Reached out to the street and they sent me a replacement right away. This thing has some weight to it, nice and heavy for it's size. And the best part about it is the mist is super fine, like I've never had anything spray as give as this. The button to spray also works well. Despite the original bottle being broken, this thing has stood up over a month of use and imo was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rajan Patel

customer_reviews.title: Not a wide spray but it’s still great!
customer_reviews.text: The spray is not as “wide” as I thought. It is almost like a strong stream. Still works well hence the 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: S.Patel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and healthy spray oil option
customer_reviews.text: Love this sprayer! Poured olive oil in and put the lid on. This prevents toxins and aerosols from Pam and other cooking sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

customer_reviews.title: squirts
customer_reviews.text: This product does not spray like it should. It squirted more than spray. The container looks nice but doesn't produce the result I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great spritzer
customer_reviews.text: I use olive oil on almost everything. This works great, gives a nice, even spray and cleans up easily. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Emmy shops

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Just used the CHUANGSIxx Olive Oil Sprayer for the first time and it works great. It gives a nice even mist of oil and I like the fact that the bottle is made of glass. I would recommend this product to any one who is looking for an oil sprayer. I was using a Misto sprayer which did not work well and found it's self in the recycle bin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Does the work well. No need to pump-it to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil sprayer looks expensive but is affordable. It provides a good spray although the mist isn't as fine as I would like. It gets the job done for my air fryer and spraying pans before cooking. It is easy to use and comes with a brush to help clean the bottle and spray nozzle. The more I use it the more I like it. Only giving it 4 stars to the quality of the spray mist.
customer_reviews.author: Brea Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for Pam
customer_reviews.text: Cooking spray, such as Pam, contains a lot of chemicals that I would rather not put in my body. This is the perfect alternative. I can fill it with whatever oil I choose and it sprays a light mist of oil to coat the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just started using. Can’t say how well it cleans. It’s easy to use although it delivers more of a mist than a spray so you would need to use a few more pumps than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Useless
customer_reviews.text: Shoots out like a jet instead of spraying evenly. It also only sprays if held up right. You cannot spray it downward... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Oil streams more than mists.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for spraying oil. While the viscosity of olive oil and vegetable vary slightly, I found it difficult to get a mist rather than a stream of vegetable oil when using this sprayer. Not sure if practice will help.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A.

customer_reviews.title: Very much needed
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use my new air fryer until I received this. It works very well and I'm happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sprayer. It is easy to use and so far [been about 2 months now] I haven't had any issues with clogging or uneven spraying
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use it on my waffle maker and it was great. Especially like glass container over other plastic ones I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: DWG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't function
customer_reviews.text: I bought the oil sprayer but it doesn't spray...it just squirts a thin line of oil without dispersing it. You advertise it as an oil and vinegar sprayer. It may work with a watery substance, but it doesn't work with the more dense olive oil. I wasted my money !
customer_reviews.author: BRK

customer_reviews.title: Olive oil spray bottle
customer_reviews.text: Pro Good Coverage Compact Bottle Con Small filling hole ( either include funnel or make hole bigger)
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not a sprayer..it's a splatter
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty but I do not like how it sprays, that is if you even want to call it a spray..more like a Splat...hard to use too. Have to grip with 1 hand a try and "Splat" out the oil with push down dispenser UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Island Queen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED IT !!
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size for my counter space. Sprays the perfect amount of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Favela

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and poorly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: The box that it came in looked opened and the bottle was broken.
customer_reviews.author: joymc

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great - For About 10 sprays
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be great based on my first use. It sprayed a fine, light mist of olive oil - exactly what I was looking for! The instructions say not to spray to quickly or you could damage it, so I was very careful to be gentle with it. Sadly, all the care in the world wouldn't have helped because I'd used it only a handful of times before it just stopped working. At that point, if anything came out at all it was in a sad stream.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: Not quite a mister.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle hoping to replace my cooking sprays with a nice mister. This seems like a quality product, but the "mist" is more of a "spray". So - it doesn't really mist across my pan or veggies, it more sprays into a puddle in one small area. I'll keep it, but I just wish it worked a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT give you a mist or spray. It streams your oil making it useless. Being returned !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't spray olive oil
customer_reviews.text: actually the only thing i liked about this thing was it's appearance. it took two hands to get it to squirt and when it did it just sprayed a stream not a mist. very hard to press down that's why it took two hands and it leaked as well making it slippery with the oil.
customer_reviews.author: ljsjr47

customer_reviews.title: Save your money do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: The oil did not spray but ran down from the top onto my fingers and hand. My son also tested it and said, you have wasted your money. Does not work and would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma K. Hosea

customer_reviews.title: does not mist well
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would actually mist to spray on food before putting in airfryer but it just sprays a stream like a squirt gun. Might work as an olive oil/vinegar spray for salad
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Much more cost effective alternative to aresol cans. **Updated** Only lasted a few months before the pump stopped working. Complete garbage, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: “K & K”

customer_reviews.title: No mist
customer_reviews.text: Sprays just squirts a stream not a mist, waste of money totally worhless
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Satchell

customer_reviews.title: Dont work
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I ever ordered from Amazon. It sprays but you have to wait for a second for it to spray agin. Very hard to push the plunger down. to happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Kansas gal

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was incredibly hard to maintain the same pressure for spraying using just one finger. It was uncomfortable to use. I will be tossing this in exchange for a better quality item
customer_reviews.author: Emily Foley

customer_reviews.title: I like it for spraying my veggies while cooking
customer_reviews.text: This has a thicker spray than some others I’ve tried. I like it for spraying my veggies while cooking. Worked very well. It would work very well to spray salad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes You Get a Spray, Sometimes a Stream
customer_reviews.text: This sometimes works as a spray, sometimes as a stream. I found that if you push it down quick, you get the spray. If you hesitate and push slowly, you get a stream. It takes some practice to get it right. What I don’t like is that it coats the outside of the glass cylinder in oil, so much so that I have to clean off the base before pressing down on the pump or my hands slide and I can’t get any traction.
customer_reviews.author: NPC-1953

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Sprays well. No drips. Good size. I like that I don’t have to pump every couple of sprays. The only thing I don’t like is that after a couple of sprays, the grip of it becomes hard and slippery.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Frequently using for preparation of foods for cooking. Saves money because I don't have to buy oils in commercial spray cans, simply fill with olive oil and spray.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these for spraying olive oil. It worked so well that I purchased two more to use for vinegar and lemon juice.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Tried Other Oil Misters-This One Works As A Spritzer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice design & it does spritz the oil, but it doesn't mist the oil (wanted this to use on pop corn). So I tried another more expensive one & that one didn't work at all ! So at least this one will spritz.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It
customer_reviews.text: She loves the olive oil sprayer. I don't know much about it but she's happy that's all that matters. it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: George Matty

customer_reviews.title: Better then others I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Better then others I've tried Glass is thicker so. May prevent breakage from simple falls Also pump opening area is larger so it's easier to pump than others
customer_reviews.author: mikez43

customer_reviews.title: Does not mist with olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Does not mist with olive oil and only sprays in a single stream despite multiple attempts; will keep as alot cheaper then other sprays and does keep use of oil low overall
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Clogs easy
customer_reviews.text: While it does spray, it Does clog very easy. That would be my only concern
customer_reviews.author: sltrawick

customer_reviews.title: Not bad sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad sprayer but its more of a stream) rather than a spray.
customer_reviews.author: Arion

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP. WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Does not spray a mist well. Super hard to clean. Broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thorsvig

product_meta.title: CHUANGSIxx Olive Oil Sprayer 3.4-Ounce Capacity Food-Grade Glass Bottle Vinegar Mister Dispenser for Cooking BBQ Salad Baking Roasting Grilling Frying, 1, Silver AMD Transparent
product_meta.description: Why Choose us▶ This oil sprayer made of 304 stainless steel and food-grade transparent glass without BPA. It will ensure you and your family health▶ We will offer you the best customer service. Solve any of your concern until you satisfied▶ Life time , not satisfied with this oil spray dispenser? just contact us and we will 100% refund you or replace you a brand new olive oil sprayer without questions With this cooking oil sprayer you will get ▶ Save your money: Our spray nozzles sprays perfect, It cover the food great and won’t leave extra oil to be wasted▶ Save your time: Just press the button and it will spray perfect oil or vinegar mist. much easier than cooking brush▶ Make you like a professional chef: It keep your hands from getting oily and the elegant design makes your counter looks more nice and classy▶ You may never imagine that using oil or other ingredients liquid can be so much easier with this oil sprayer. You can fill the oil sprayer with any oil, juice, wine, vinegar or water under different situations It would be more useful and convenience Specifications: ▶ Material: 304 Stainless steel and Food and grade transparent glass ▶ Color: Sliver stainless steel lid and transparent glass container▶ Size: 1. 6 in x 7in (W x H)▶ Weight: 0. 6lb （230g) ▶ Capacity: 3. 42 oz. or 100mlWarm tips: ▶First time use, please press the button several times until it works well ▶To ensure a fine mist, don't fill it too much oil and press the button forcefully all the way down▶ Please don't put impurities liquid in it to avoid sprayer nozzle blocked▶ As the oil is easy to solidify, cause the sprayer spray a stream. Just run the nozzle under warm water for a few seconds, It will return to normal▶ Recommend to clean your oil dispenser every 6-8 weeks to avoid oil buildup▶ Using a little vinegar to clean it If the Stainless Steel lid dirty
feature_bullets: ▶ Multifunction: For this cooking sprayer, just press the button to produces perfect olive oil, vinegar, juice, wine mist etc. for salad, BBQ, any other cooking. It's very useful and convenience kitchen gadget for cooking

▶ Healthy & Practical: Our olive oil sprayer is made of 304 stainless steel and food-grade transparent glass without BPA. built-in nozzle prevents the dust pollution. which is healthier for you and your family.

▶ No oil or liquid leakage: This vinegar spray dispenser threaded glass bottleneck design provides better, It has excellent seal, don't worry there will be olive oil, sunflower oil, sherry, marsala wine, lemon and lime juice leakage.

▶ Easy to use and clean: Simply fill your favorite oil or other ingredients liquid into the container, and then press the pressurized sprayer. MEANWHILE, cleaning is very easy. Just fill the bottle with warm water and add a drop of detergent, tighten the lid, shake it for 6-10 times and spray all liquid. Repeat for 3-5 times. then you can get a nearly new bottle.
▶ Life time : We are confidence with this high quality oil sprayer, if you are not happy with it or our customer service, we will 100% refund you or replace you a brand new.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
